enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
section_title: SUBSIDIARY BODY FOR IMPLEMENTATION: Education, training and public awareness
sentences: SBI 27 considered education, training and public awareness (Convention Article 6) in its opening session on 4 December.
The EU, the Gambia, Japan, Iran, Senegal, Kenya and others stressed the need for a follow-up to the New Delhi work programme on Article 6, since the programme had to be reviewed in 2007.

The issue was referred to a contact group chaired by Marie Jaudet (France) and Qingchen Chao (China), which developed brief draft conclusions and a draft COP decision on an amended New Delhi work programme with a mandate extended by five years.
The SBI adopted the conclusions on 11 December, and the COP adopted the decision on 14 December.
A UN representative noted that the UN will be working towards becoming carbon neutral.
